# Data Source: tfe_project

Use this data source to get information about a project.

## Example Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataTfeProject } from "./.gen/providers/tfe/data-tfe-project";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    new DataTfeProject(this, "foo", {
      name: "my-project-name",
      organization: "my-org-name",
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:
* `name` - (Required) Name of the project.
* `organization` - (Required) Name of the organization.


## Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

* `id` - The project ID.
* `workspaceIds` - IDs of the workspaces that are associated with the project.
